title: What is the best playlist you know on Spotify or would like to share? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, But I tend to just group albums together that I like and give them exciting titles like "Music I like 1." which consists of albums from Buzzcocks, Gwedu-Blay Ombelley, Mavis Staples, Miranda Lee Richards, New Order, Rokia Traroe, The Third Ear Band, and Treetop Flyers.https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2L3BCmedh8w4EyQWvbZSG8?si=Ugw5bitnTaOKaXr83s3_nA2. Cowboy junkies, rolling stones, Shonen knive.https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3bmES0npJ1Kk85W1yQqe9g?si=J3g-b29wRb-9L_GzIwC2qw3. Ali Faike Toure,The Boys, Cry Before Dawn, Ian Noe, In Tua Nua, Moby Grape, Old Crow Medicine Show, The Stunning, Sun Kill Moon. (Bit of an irish trip)https://open.spotify.com/playlist/0u5wB3wU0yO8FbyvxPLZFU?si=Y6A6mRigQwWFFMUx7hX03Q4. Freakwater, Ladytron, Neil Young, Paul McCartney,https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1PDDlWZWn6zz8IjTuholNI?si=J9nJhWQCSXW2BP7Uq8JXuA5. The Adverts, Bette LaVette, Buena Vista social club, Freakwater, Patricia Vonne, Pixies, REM.Shout out Louds, Soul To Soul, Tim Buckley.https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4GvrTu5fNrCxRTU3ROCcS1?si=5BcYzyjQRHStVsuqrbnaKg6. The Allman Brothers, Kate Bush, Band-Maid, Charles Mingus, cowboy junkies, Ella Fitzgerald, Funkadelic, Gram Parsons, The Kinkshttps://open.spotify.com/playlist/6KYyIPTKei2QlLJbxwC7ay?si=OejvRQR3Q7y6FMdGzhQ44w7. Bob Dylan, The Crickets, Dur-Dur Band, Foo Fighters, Stevie Wonder, Tom Petty, Trevor Moss and Hannah Lou, Uncle Tupelo.https://open.spotify.com/playlist/7tinTTwcmWXyddi88Bu1c8?si=wvHnrJm2RnOIRMAncT9l0Q

Hell yeah! Why not? People would experience some great music and learn about Industrial Hardcore!
